summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4892 for the improvement of East 45th Street, from University Way to 20th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56100, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
